chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
D: cpo
s: Pred D
C: chain_closed s
u: chain tp
x: Poset.sort tp

Goal:
x \In u -> x <== sub_lim u

Premises:
chain_closed = fun T : cpo => [Pred s | bot \In s /\ (forall d : chain T, d <=p s -> lim d \In s)] : forall T : cpo, Simpl_Pred (Pred T) Arguments chain_closed {T}
Notation Poset T m := (Poset.pack id)
sub_lim = fun u : chain tp => exist (Mem s) (lim [sval^^ubysval_mono]) (sub_limX u) : chain tp -> tp
Pred = fun T : Type => T -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments Pred _%type_scope
CPO.sort = fun t : cpo => let (sort, _, _) := t in sort : cpo -> Type CPO.sort is a coercion
List.In : forall A : Type, A -> seq A -> Prop
Record chain (T : poset) : Type := Chain { pred_of : Pred T; _ : chain_axiom pred_of } Arguments Chain [T pred_of]
Mem_map_inv : ?x \In [seq ?f i | i <- ?s] -> exists y : ?T, ?x = ?f y /\ y \In ?s where ?T : [D : cpo s : Pred D C : chain_closed s u : chain tp x : tp |- Type] ?T' : [D : cpo s : Pred D C : chain_closed s u : chain tp x : tp |- Type] ?f : [D : cpo s : Pred D C : chain_closed s u : chain tp x : tp |- ?T -> ?T'] ?x : [D : cpo s : Pred D C : chain_closed s u : chain tp x : tp |- ?T'] ?s : [D : cpo s : Pred D C : chain_closed s u : chain tp x : tp |- seq ?T]
app_mono : forall x0 : ?A, monotone (@^~ x0) where ?A : [D : cpo s : Pred D C : chain_closed s u : chain tp x : tp |- Type] ?T : [D : cpo s : Pred D C : chain_closed s u : chain tp x : tp |- poset]
Record mixin_of (T : poset) : Type := Mixin { mx_bot : Poset.sort T; mx_lim : chain T -> T; _ : forall x : T, mx_bot <== x; _ : forall (s : chain T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_lim s; _ : forall (s : chain T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_lim s <== x } Arguments CPO.Mixin [T mx_bot] [mx_lim]%function_scope (_ _ _)%function_scope
sub_supP : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) (C : sup_closed s) (u : Pred (subPoset s)) (x : subPoset s), x \In u -> x <== sub_sup C u
sub_supM : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) (C : sup_closed s) (u : Pred (subPoset s)) (x : subPoset s), (forall y : subPoset s, y \In u -> y <== x) -> sub_sup C u <== x
sub_supX : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T), sup_closed s -> forall u : Pred (subPoset s), sub_sup' u \In s
CPOMixin : forall (T : poset) (mx_bot : T) (mx_lim : chain T -> T), (forall x : T, mx_bot <== x) -> (forall (s : chain T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_lim s) -> (forall (s : chain T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_lim s <== x) -> CPO.mixin_of T
lat_limP : forall (A : lattice) (s : chain A) (x : A), x \In s -> x <== lat_lim s
limP : forall (D : cpo) (s : chain D) (x : D), x \In s -> x <== lim s
sub_limX : forall u : chain tp, lim [sval^^ubysval_mono] \In s
fun_limP : forall (A : Type) (B : cpo) (s : chain [posetofA -> B]) (x : [posetofA -> B]), x \In s -> x <== fun_lim s
pair_limP : forall (A B : cpo) (s : chain [posetofA * B]) (x : [posetofA * B]), x \In s -> x <== pair_lim s
limM : forall (D : cpo) (s : chain D) (x : D), (forall y : D, y \In s -> y <== x) -> lim s <== x
lat_limM : forall (A : lattice) (s : chain A) (x : A), (forall y : A, y \In s -> y <== x) -> lat_lim s <== x
supP : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== sup s
chain_clos_diag : forall (T : cpo) (s : Pred (T * T)), chain_closed s -> chain_closed [Pred t | (t, t) \In s]
LatticeMixin : forall (T : poset) (mx_sup : Pred T -> T), (forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_sup s) -> (forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_sup s <== x) -> Lattice.mixin_of T
dfun_limP : forall (A : Type) (B : A -> cpo) (s : chain (dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x))) (x : dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x)), x \In s -> x <== dfun_lim s
fun_limM : forall (A : Type) (B : cpo) (s : chain [posetofA -> B]) (x : [posetofA -> B]), (forall y : [posetofA -> B], y \In s -> y <== x) -> fun_lim s <== x
infM : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred_Class) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> x <== y) -> x <== inf s
infP : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred_Class) (x : T), x \In s -> inf s <== x
Record mixin_of (T : poset) : Type := Mixin { mx_sup : Pred T -> T; _ : forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_sup s; _ : forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_sup s <== x } Arguments Lattice.Mixin [T] [mx_sup]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope
pair_limM : forall (A B : cpo) (s : chain [posetofA * B]) (x : [posetofA * B]), (forall y : [posetofA * B], y \In s -> y <== x) -> pair_lim s <== x
supM : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> sup s <== x
dfun_limM : forall (A : Type) (B : A -> cpo) (s : chain (dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x))) (x : dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x)), (forall y : dfunPoset (fun x0 : A => B x0), y \In s -> y <== x) -> dfun_lim s <== x
chain_clos_idemp : forall (T : cpo) (s : Pred T), chain_closed s -> chain_closure s =p s
chain_closI : forall (T : cpo) (s1 s2 : Pred T), chain_closed s1 -> chain_closed s2 -> chain_closed (PredI s1 s2)
prop_limM : forall (s : chain [posetofProp]) (p : [posetofProp]), (forall q : [posetofProp], q \In s -> q <== p) -> prop_lim s <== p
prop_limP : forall (s : chain [posetofProp]) (p : [posetofProp]), p \In s -> p <== prop_lim s
dfun_supM : forall (A : Type) (B : A -> lattice) (s : Pred (dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x))) (p : dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x)), (forall q : dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x), q \In s -> q <== p) -> dfun_sup s <== p

```coq
intros x Hx.
assert (Hsub : x <== lim u) by (apply sub_supP with (u := [sval^^ubysval_mono]); auto).
apply limM.
intros y Hy.
assert (Hy' : y \In [sval^^ubysval_mono]) by (apply Mem_map_inv with (f := sval) (s := u); auto).
apply app_mono with (x0 := x) in Hy'.
apply sub_supM with (u := [sval^^ubysval_mono]) in Hy'; auto.
Qed.```
